thread.title: Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer at age 60
thread.title_full: Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer at age 60

title: Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer at age 60
text:
Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer at age 60 Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer at age 60 
Washington Wizards head coach Flip Saunders reacts after a foul is called against his team in the second half of their NBA basketball game against the Boston Celtics in Boston, Massachusetts November 17, 2010. (Brian Snyder/Reuters) Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer at age 60 
Jun 26, 2015; Minneapolis, MN, USA; Minnesota Timberwolves head coach Flip Saunders (left) number one overall draft pick Karl-Anthony Towns (center) and Tyus Jones (right) address the media at Mayo Clinic Square. Mandatory Credit: Brad Rempel-USA TODAY Sports - RTX1HZ32 reviewjournal.com 
Flip Saunders, whose 35-year coaching career included successful stops with the Minnesota Timberwolves and Detroit Pistons died Sunday of cancer at the age of 60, ESPN reported. 
Sanders announced in August he was being treated for Hodgkin lymphoma. On Friday, it was announced he would not return to coach the Timberwolves this season as he planned to undergo treatment. 
He had been hospitalized since September after experiencing complications following the completion of chemotherapy, Reuters reported. 
This is a breaking news story. Check back for updates.
